feed.title: GitHub TeX Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of TeX in GitHub

entry.title: ResearchMethods-ZHAW/Statistik
entry.summary:
• run pandoc --extract-media ./images ReMe_Statistik-Skript_v.25.docx -o index.md
  • run find . -name "*.emf" -exec inkscape -o {}.png {} \;
  • replance ".emf" with ".emf.png"
  • replace "^$ ^**(.+)**" with " {.r} $1 "
  • replace " {.r}" with " "
